title: PayDay 2 - Multiplayer MP Fix v6
description:
This is the latest MP Fix v6 for PayDay 2!  Tested and working just 5 minutes ago, with 1000 players online, using PayDay 2 Update 11 HOTFIX

Step 1 - Install PayDay 2, FTL release
Step 2 - Update PayDay 2 to Update 11 HOTFIX (haven't tested Update 12 yet, there may be more or fewer players on it)
Step 3 - Install STEAM
Step 4 - Run STEAM, log in with a FAKE account
Step 5 - Run PayDay 2 
Step 6 - Select Crime.NET
Step 7 - Make sure that active players count on top left of Crime.NET screen is higher than 0.  If it is, and you still don't see any games to join, select 'filters', and change 'close' to 'far' or 'worldwide'.  Don't worry about the pings on 'worldwide' servers, the game's netcode is written so well that the game plays PERFECTLY FINE on a server that's halfway around the world!

Have fun!  Let me know if it works with UPDATE 12 too!
